workflow.description: HBNONPayment Approval on bills without PO
workflow.name: HBNONPayment Approval on bills w/o PO

initcondition.formula: "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'

( "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' )
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'
"Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F'

( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role2") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role3") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 2") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 3") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role4") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 4") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role6") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 6") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role7") AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' )

( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 2") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role4") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 4") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role6","Role7") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 6") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 7") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 8") AND "User Role" IN ("Role8") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' AND "User" IN ("Employee2") ) OR ( "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 9") AND "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' )
"User Role" IN ("Role1","Role2")

( "User Role" IN ("Role1") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 2") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 3") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role4") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 4") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role6","Role7") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 6") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 7") )

( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 2") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role4") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 4") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role6","Role7") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 6") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 7") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") )

( "User Role" IN ("Role1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 2") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role4") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 4") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role6","Role7") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 6") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role2") AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 7") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role3") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role5") AND "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 5") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' ) OR ( "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 8") AND "User Role" IN ("Role8") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' AND "User" IN ("Employee2") ) OR ( "Vendor Department for Approval" IN ("HBNO Vendor Departments List 9") AND "User Role" IN ("Role3") AND "User" IN ("Employee1") AND isChecked("Is It Shipping Bill") = 'F' )
"HBNO User" IN ("User")
"HBNO User" NOT IN ("User") AND "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1")
"User Role" IN ("Role1","Role2")
"User Role" IN ("Role1","Role2")
"User Role" NOT IN ("Role1","Role2")
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T'
"Amount" = "Amount"
isEmpty("Rejection Reason") = 'F'
"HBNO User" IN ("User") OR "HBNO Role" IN ("Role1")
"HBNO User" NOT IN ("User") OR "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1")
"User Role" IN ("Role1","Role2")
"User Role" IN ("Role1","Role2")
"User Role" NOT IN ("Role1","Role2")
( "HBNO User" IN ("User") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role1") )
( "HBNO User" NOT IN ("User") ) OR ( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1") )
"User Role" IN ("Role1")
"User Role" IN ("Role1")
"User Role" NOT IN ("Role1")
"HBNO User" IN ("User")
( "HBNO User" NOT IN ("User") ) OR ( "User Role" IN ("Role1") )
( "User Role" NOT IN ("Role1","Role2","Role3") )

( isChecked("Invoice received from vendor matches with all aspects of bill entered") = 'T' AND isChecked("Due date matches terms of the Vendor Invoice") = 'T' AND isChecked("transaction statement of vendor dating 1 year back matches amounts paid to vendor on internal payment history report") = 'T' AND isChecked("Evaluate method of payment history against vendor") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'T' ) OR ( isChecked("transaction statement of vendor dating 1 year back matches amounts paid to vendor on internal payment history report") = 'T' AND isChecked("Evaluate method of payment history against vendor") = 'T' AND isChecked("Invoice received from vendor matches with all aspects of PO") = 'T' AND isChecked("Due date matches terms of the PO") = 'T' AND isChecked("Connects bill to PO") = 'T' AND isChecked("Material is Quality Control Approved ") = 'T' AND isChecked("Material is fully received") = 'T' AND isEmpty("PO Document # (Stored)") = 'F' )
